Package main.java.matrices

Class CMatrix<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.matrices.GMatrix<T>
      • main.java.matrices.CMatrix<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Comparable generic type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<T>, Matrix
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DMatrix
    public class CMatrix<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
extends GMatrix<T>
    This GMatrix represents a comparable matrix that contains comparable objects. This allows for further functionality to be applied to matrices that require comparing matrix content.
    Author:
    Joshua McDonagh

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CMatrix()
      Constructor method which creates an empty matrix.

      Constructor method which creates a matrix with a set height and width.

      Constructor method which creates a matrix from a 2D array.
